name: Niji Color Style（Niji二次元线条色彩画风）LoRa
description:
这是一款仿niji色彩的一个画风lora，突出的特点就是线条感和色块的运用。

This is a drawing style lora that imitates the color of niji. The prominent feature is the sense of lines and the use of color blocks.

权重Weight：0.8

触发词Trigger word：niji color

喜欢的话大家点一下小星星！

If you like it, click on the little star!
